• Multiplayer mining game using MQTT.js for real-time interactions
  • Procedurally generated underground world with tile-based resource collection
  • Persistent player progression with stats tracking and upgrade systems
    const Game = new GameEngine();
    Network.connect();

Mega Miner Online is a web-based multiplayer game where players explore procedurally generated mines. Players drill resources, trade with others via MQTT messaging, and upgrade their equipment. The game includes persistence through local storage, real-time coordinates display, and interactive UI panels for inventory management.
